column2: "Welcome back! Did you come up with anything? Huh? I should incorporate two conflicting characteristics into my mascot?!"
"I'm having a hard time even thinking of one, and you want me to come up with two?! Hold on, are you saying I should combine two opposite character traits?"
"I see... If you combine personality traits that you wouldn't normally see together, you create a really unusual and interesting character!"
"Alright, that should do the job! Thanks for your incredible idea! I think I can get this done in time!"
